title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 2.6 - Location and hours
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 2.6 - Location and hours

State Regulations
(a) Records shall
be made available at the main office of the department, located at 30 South

Pearl Street, Albany, NY 12245. (b) The department shall accept requests for records and produce records during
regular business hours, which are between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m., any day except

Saturday, Sunday, a public holiday or a day on which the department is
otherwise closed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
2.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
